bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Egypt in Late Antiquity .
Princeton, Princeton University Press, 1993, 8°, xii-370 pp., 1 arbre généal., 11 figg., 1 carte. ISBN 0-691-06986-7.

Introduction. - 1. The Environment. - 2. The Cities. - 3. Country Villages. - 4. City and Country. - 5. People and Families. - 6. Power and Dependence. - 7. Languages, Literacy, and Ethnicity. - 8. This World and the Next. - 9. A Mediterranean Society. - Appendices. - Bibliography. - Indices.
